attributes.action: Suspend Politician and Parliamentary wages until the UK leaves The EU in full.
attributes.background: Due to the fact that Brexit has not taken place when it should have and Politicians are preventing what the public voted for by not working together and sorting out the problems then they should not get paid until such time as a full Brexit exists.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
